m_szDocTitle: Next Big Future: Rare Earth Embargos, Supply Problems and the overall situation and longer term view
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Rare Earth Embargos, Supply Problems and the overall situation and longer term view Reddit Most of the world is dependent on China to supply rare earths as key raw materials used in many of the latest technologies from military hardware to electric cars, but China's Ministry of Commerce is warning that its massive supply of rare earths could be exhausted in just 15 - 20 years. Although China accounts for almost all the global production of rare earth elements, its dominance is a consequence of economics and government regulation, not geology, writes Ed Crooks i
